summary: Two bumbling but determined three-day film school graduates enter the Montreal World Film Festival with a feature film that doesn't exist.
cast: John Cho|Seth Meyers|Raymond O'Connor|Jim Piddock|Patton Oswalt|Jessica Paré|Jessalyn Gilsig|Annie Pascale|Dominic Desjardins|Rylan Wilkie|Mylene Fortin|Philippe LaPerriere|Jean Pierre Bergeron|Paul Weitz|Simon Peacock|Daniel Brochu|Miguel Arteta|Chris Weitz|Charles Papasoff|Michael Rigby|Peter Kellner|Donny Falsetti|Robert Alesandro|Christine Ghawi|Gary Day|Richard Roll|David M. Rosenthal|Joseph M. Smith
title: No te la pierdas
